Body:
l = lookup.TemplateLookup()
l.put_string('a',
    """
        <%def name="table()">
            im table
        </%def>
        """
    )
l.put_string('b',
    """
        <%namespace file="a" import="table"/>

        <%
            def table2():
                table()
                return ""
        %>

        ${table2()}
        """
    )
t = l.get_template('b')
assert flatten_result(t.render()) == 'im table'
